product.name: 1-1/2" X 20' PVC SCH 40 Foam Core Pipe - Plain End
product.productOverview: Pipe; Nominal Pipe Size 1-1/2"; Schedule 40 S; Thickness 0.145"; Length 20'; End Connection Plain x Plain; Material PVC; Material Specification ASTM D4396/F891; Finish White; Temperature Rating 140 Deg F; Application DWV, Sewer and Storm Drainage; Applicable Standard NSF 14; Warranty 5 Year Limited
product.featuresAndBenefits: PVC Schedule 40 Foam Core Pipe is for DWV Purposes Only; It is for Non-Pressure Systems Where Temperatures will Not Exceed 140 Deg F; It is Coextruded and has a Cellular Core; PVC Schedule 40 Foam Core is Lightweight, Non-Toxic and Easy to Install; Installation Requires Primer and Solvent Cement; 5 Year Limited Warranty
